Within the past month I have realized that my job has mostly consisted of correcting spelling, capitalization, and punctuation instead of correcting any grammar. I gave since then been seeking help to perfect myself further.
 Are there any websites you suggest for me in order to learn better? I am always seeking improvement. 
Always.
Every day, I make about 50 YouTube comments, and I get more than 200 replies. The secret is dedication. Also, I notice from your channel's history that you don't correct a lot of grammar.

Hello, friend. I was wondering if you could please set me at the top of your 'Fellow Grammar Nazis' featured channels. Also, I am curious to learn your secret of how to obtain so many subscribers on a daily basis.
